setting.time: Early 1600s Spain, early autumn, pre-dawn darkness giving way to first light
setting.location: Edge of La Mancha village, dirt road leading to countryside, Spain
setting.weather: Cool pre-dawn air, stars fading as sky lightens in east

characters.appearance: Thin knight, late 40s, proud posture despite worn appearance
characters.clothing: Polished but mismatched armor, plumed helmet, lance held upright
characters.position: Mounted on thin, aging horse, leading the way
characters.action: Riding forward with determined expression, lance pointed skyward

characters.clothing: Traveling cloak over peasant clothes, cloth bundle tied to back
characters.position: Following on sturdy donkey, loaded with supplies
characters.action: Glancing back at village while following master

scene.mainElements: Two riders silhouetted against lightening sky, leaving sleeping village behind, embarking on dirt road that winds toward horizon, sense of adventure beginning, no text or letters visible
scene.details: Saddlebags and rolled blankets on both mounts, cooking pot tied to donkey, water skins hanging from saddles, village dogs watching departure, first birds beginning to sing, dew on roadside grass, wagon wheel ruts in dirt road, stone mile marker beside path, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Village buildings still dark with few lit windows, church spire prominent, fields and olive groves emerging from darkness
scene.atmosphere: Epic journey beginning in humble fashion, contrast between grand ambitions and modest reality, quiet determination mixed with uncertainty, threshold between familiar and unknown, no text or letters visible

composition.cameraAngle: Following shot from behind and slightly elevated
composition.focus: Two riders moving away from camera into dawn
composition.depth: Foreground shows village edge, middle ground captures departing duo, background opens to vast countryside
